publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1324 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Netherdale Campus Textile Design Course-That the Parliament condemns the proposed transfer by Heriot-Watt University of the textile design course from the Netherdale Campus to the Riccarton Campus; notes that this proposed closure will affect mostly female students who make up 80% of the course intake; congratulates the students of the Netherdale Campus on their decision to hold a referendum on the proposed transfer, and calls on the Vice-Principal, Professor John Simmons, and the Heriot-Watt University Court to reconsider its decision at its meeting on 24 May 2004.
S2M-1324 Netherdale Campus Textile Design Course (lodged on 17 May 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
